name: The Dash Club
description:
Welcome to the floor, dancer.

You will control the best Gecko dancer of the club while enchanting all the audience with your graceful moves.

Your job as dancer is to avoid losing points walking through the green and golden tiles while avoiding the red ones.

Let's the dance begin!

Controls:

  • LEFT/RIGHT => move
  • SPACE + LEFT/RIGHT => dash

IMPORTANT: While dashing your score is not affected.

Tiles:

  • Green: +10
  • Red: -30
  • Golden: +100
  • Blue: jump

Credits

  • Sound: Joan Garcia
  • Art/Animation: Ferran Prat
  • Programming: Arnau Albuixech, Marc Solà
